items.title: Yessenia is selling tamales for Christmas! Growing up she...
items.content_html:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling tamales for Christmas! Growing up she learned to make tamales with both banana leaves & corn husks. Hojas de ma√≠z üåΩ are more popular in northern and central Mexico, while hojas de pl√°tano üçå reign supreme in tamales made further south. In Denver, you‚Äôre more likely to see tamales made with corn husks, although those made with banana leaves are becoming more popular. They also tend to be more expensive, as the large banana leaves can hold more tamal. Yessenia is selling them for just $12 by the half dozen. You can order your Christmas tamales at https://SolidarityChristmas.paperform.co.

This Saturday support Gaby Miranda

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Gaby is selling pollo en mole & tofu con sabor mexicano on December 19. Her husband was deported earlier this year, and Gaby‚Äôs been working to support their fam...ily on her own ever since. This weekend she‚Äôs raising money to help pay for legal fees associated with her husband‚Äôs appeal. You can help support her by purchasing food at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.
